lyrics:
30 contributorsback for you lyricsverse 1 liam harry
whenever i close my eyes i picture you there
im lookin out at the crowd youre everywhere
im watching you from the stage yeah
your smile is on every face now
but every time you wake up youre hearing me say goodbye

chorus all
baby you dont have to worry
ill be coming back for you
back for you back for you you
lately ive been going crazy
so im coming back for you
back for you back for you you

verse 2 louis harry
ive never been so into somebody before
and every time we both touch i only want more
so tell me nothings gonna change yeah
and you wont ever walk away yeah
cause even though every night youll know what ill say goodbye

chorus all
baby you dont have to worry
ill be coming back for you
back for you back for you you
lately ive been going crazy
so im coming back for you
back for you back for you you
you might also likebridge louis
right back for you ohwoah
right back for you right back for you

breakdown liam zayn
lately ive been going crazy
so im coming back
yeah i am coming back for you

chorus all zayn harry
baby you dont have to worry
ill be coming back for you
back for you back for you for you for you woah
lately ive been going crazy crazy yeah
so im coming back for you
back for you back for you you yeah

outro all harry
right back for you right back
right back for you right back
right back for you right back
right back for you cmon
lately ive been going crazy
so im coming back for you
back for you back for you you9embed
